description: Base category type for organizing and grouping related GTS entities. Categories provide a hierarchical classification system for queries, templates, datasources, items, layouts, and widgets.

name.description: Display name of the category. Used in UI navigation and grouping.

description.description: Detailed description explaining the purpose and scope of this category. Helps users understand what types of entities belong in this category.

icon.description: Icon identifier (e.g., Lucide icon name) for visual representation in UI. Used in navigation menus, cards, and category selectors.

examples.name: Sales Analytics
examples.description: Category for sales-related queries, dashboards, and reports. Includes revenue tracking, customer analytics, and sales pipeline monitoring.

examples.name: System Monitoring
examples.description: Category for infrastructure and system monitoring resources. Contains server metrics, performance dashboards, and alerting queries.
